channel.title: How do we handle the post-Look change?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "How do we handle the post-Look change?"

item.title: Re: How do we handle the post-Look change?
item.content:encoded: Went ahead and did that. Lemme know if that's how you wanted it, or if we should make it any different. Thinking we should make new missions for all the ones which get changed post-Look and add those in too, rather than just putting the changes in the original mission. E.g., make Noises and Noises (Post-Look).

item.title: Re: How do we handle the post-Look change?
item.content:encoded: Should probably add in a new tab for the post- missions.

item.title: How do we handle the post-Look change?
item.content:encoded: Add in a new category of missions, the way we did for Inner Wasteland? Add the missions to the appropriate categories and put "Have not completed The Look" and "Have completed The Look" in the content? Even ignoring casually spoiling the content (I don't care what happens if you click on it, but if you're just looking at the Missions page, you shouldn't have your game experience spoiled), it's kind of a complex little situation to handle.
